title: Tonneiadel

content: What is corechain?It is new innovative chain based on satoshi plus consensus Providing Decenterliziation and security through POW by BTC miners , where they participate in securing the corechain by delegating their hash to the chain and get rewarded in core currency . Passive income while they are mining BTC Scalability thus it is EVM compatible so it is easy for developers to deploy on it The chain have been audited by 3 security firms which are Least authority/hallborn/certikThey already lunched their audit results The development team is Coredao Community members in Twitter 1.3 million Community members in discord are 150k Test Chain active address 8 million More details Coredao.org Twitter @coredao_org
